name: PPS_PROTOCOL
description: DICOM Performed Procedure Step Protocol information.

columns.name: IMY_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PPS_PROTOCOL_C_NAME
columns.description: The protocol category ID for the protocol performed during this DICOM Performed Procedure Step.
